text:
Example : 
http://www.naturaltitsgirls.com/boobs/big-naturals-13/../../../../../../../
returned error "Test Page for the Apache Web Server on Red Hat Linux".

It returns Bad Request here ...

And apart from this, 2.0.40 is quite outdated, you may want to update anyway.

Thanks for using Apache.
